00077 typedef struct OGLRender {
00078     Main *bmain;
00079     Render *re;
00080     Scene *scene;
00081 
00082     View3D *v3d;
00083     RegionView3D *rv3d;
00084     ARegion *ar;
00085 
00086     ScrArea *prevsa;
00087     ARegion *prevar;
00088 
00089     short obcenter_dia_back; /* temp overwrite */
00090 
00091     short is_sequencer;
00092     SpaceSeq *sseq;
00093 
00094 
00095     Image *ima;
00096     ImageUser iuser;
00097 
00098     GPUOffScreen *ofs;
00099     int sizex, sizey;
00100     int write_still;
00101 
00102     ReportList *reports;
00103     bMovieHandle *mh;
00104     int cfrao, nfra;
00105 
00106     wmTimer *timer; /* use to check if running modal or not (invoke'd or exec'd)*/
00107 } OGLRender;
00108 
00109 /* added because v3d is not always valid */
00110 static unsigned int screen_opengl_layers(OGLRender *oglrender)
00111 {
00112     if (oglrender->v3d) {
00113         return oglrender->scene->lay | oglrender->v3d->lay;
00114     }
00115     else {
00116         return oglrender->scene->lay;
00117     }
00118 }
00119 
00120 static void screen_opengl_render_apply(OGLRender *oglrender)
00121 {
00122     Scene *scene = oglrender->scene;
00123     ARegion *ar = oglrender->ar;
00124     View3D *v3d = oglrender->v3d;
00125     RegionView3D *rv3d = oglrender->rv3d;
00126     RenderResult *rr;
00127     Object *camera = NULL;
00128     ImBuf *ibuf;
00129     void *lock;
00130     float winmat[4][4];
00131     int sizex = oglrender->sizex;
00132     int sizey = oglrender->sizey;
00133     const short view_context = (v3d != NULL);
00134 
00135     rr = RE_AcquireResultRead(oglrender->re);
00136 
00137     if (oglrender->is_sequencer) {
00138         SeqRenderData context;
00139         int chanshown = oglrender->sseq ? oglrender->sseq->chanshown : 0;
00140 
00141         context = seq_new_render_data(oglrender->bmain, scene, oglrender->sizex, oglrender->sizey, 100.0f);
00142 
00143         ibuf = give_ibuf_seq(context, CFRA, chanshown);
00144 
00145         if (ibuf) {
00146             BLI_assert((oglrender->sizex == ibuf->x) && (oglrender->sizey == ibuf->y));
00147 
00148             if (ibuf->rect_float == NULL) {
00149                 IMB_float_from_rect(ibuf);
00150             }
00151 
00152             memcpy(rr->rectf, ibuf->rect_float, sizeof(float) * 4 * oglrender->sizex * oglrender->sizey);
00153 
00154             IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
00155         }
00156     }
00157     else if (view_context) {
00158         GPU_offscreen_bind(oglrender->ofs); /* bind */
00159 
00160         /* render 3d view */
00161         if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB && v3d->camera) {
00162             /*int is_ortho= scene->r.mode & R_ORTHO;*/
00163             camera = v3d->camera;
00164             RE_GetCameraWindow(oglrender->re, camera, scene->r.cfra, winmat);
00165             
00166         }
00167         else {
00168             rctf viewplane;
00169             float clipsta, clipend;
00170 
00171             int is_ortho = ED_view3d_viewplane_get(v3d, rv3d, sizex, sizey, &viewplane, &clipsta, &clipend);
00172             if (is_ortho) orthographic_m4(winmat, viewplane.xmin, viewplane.xmax, viewplane.ymin, viewplane.ymax, -clipend, clipend);
00173             else perspective_m4(winmat, viewplane.xmin, viewplane.xmax, viewplane.ymin, viewplane.ymax, clipsta, clipend);
00174         }
00175 
00176         if ((scene->r.mode & R_OSA) == 0) { 
00177             ED_view3d_draw_offscreen(scene, v3d, ar, sizex, sizey, NULL, winmat, TRUE);
00178             GPU_offscreen_read_pixels(oglrender->ofs, GL_FLOAT, rr->rectf);
00179         }
00180         else {
00181             /* simple accumulation, less hassle then FSAA FBO's */
00182             static float jit_ofs[32][2];
00183             float winmat_jitter[4][4];
00184             float *accum_buffer = MEM_mallocN(sizex * sizey * sizeof(float) * 4, "accum1");
00185             float *accum_tmp = MEM_mallocN(sizex * sizey * sizeof(float) * 4, "accum2");
00186             int j;
00187 
00188             BLI_initjit(jit_ofs[0], scene->r.osa);
00189 
00190             /* first sample buffer, also initializes 'rv3d->persmat' */
00191             ED_view3d_draw_offscreen(scene, v3d, ar, sizex, sizey, NULL, winmat, TRUE);
00192             GPU_offscreen_read_pixels(oglrender->ofs, GL_FLOAT, accum_buffer);
00193 
00194             /* skip the first sample */
00195             for (j = 1; j < scene->r.osa; j++) {
00196                 copy_m4_m4(winmat_jitter, winmat);
00197                 window_translate_m4(winmat_jitter, rv3d->persmat,
00198                                     (jit_ofs[j][0] * 2.0f) / sizex,
00199                                     (jit_ofs[j][1] * 2.0f) / sizey);
00200 
00201                 ED_view3d_draw_offscreen(scene, v3d, ar, sizex, sizey, NULL, winmat_jitter, TRUE);
00202                 GPU_offscreen_read_pixels(oglrender->ofs, GL_FLOAT, accum_tmp);
00203                 add_vn_vn(accum_buffer, accum_tmp, sizex * sizey * sizeof(float));
00204             }
00205 
00206             mul_vn_vn_fl(rr->rectf, accum_buffer, sizex * sizey * sizeof(float), 1.0f / scene->r.osa);
00207 
00208             MEM_freeN(accum_buffer);
00209             MEM_freeN(accum_tmp);
00210         }
00211 
00212         GPU_offscreen_unbind(oglrender->ofs); /* unbind */
00213     }
00214     else {
00215         /* shouldnt suddenly give errors mid-render but possible */
00216         char err_out[256] = "unknown";
00217         ImBuf *ibuf_view = ED_view3d_draw_offscreen_imbuf_simple(scene, scene->camera, oglrender->sizex, oglrender->sizey, IB_rectfloat, OB_SOLID, TRUE, err_out);
00218         camera = scene->camera;
00219 
00220         if (ibuf_view) {
00221             memcpy(rr->rectf, ibuf_view->rect_float, sizeof(float) * 4 * oglrender->sizex * oglrender->sizey);
00222             IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf_view);
00223         }
00224         else {
00225             fprintf(stderr, "%s: failed to get buffer, %s\n", __func__, err_out);
00226         }
00227     }
00228     
00229     /* rr->rectf is now filled with image data */
00230 
00231     if ((scene->r.stamp & R_STAMP_ALL) && (scene->r.stamp & R_STAMP_DRAW))
00232         BKE_stamp_buf(scene, camera, NULL, rr->rectf, rr->rectx, rr->recty, 4);
00233 
00234     /* note on color management:
00235      *
00236      * OpenGL renders into sRGB colors, but render buffers are expected to be
00237      * linear if color management is enabled. So we convert to linear here, so
00238      * the conversion back to bytes using the color management flag can make it
00239      * sRGB again, and so that e.g. openexr saving also saves the correct linear
00240      * float buffer. */
00241 
00242     if (oglrender->scene->r.color_mgt_flag & R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT) {
00243         int predivide = 0; /* no alpha */
00244 
00245         IMB_buffer_float_from_float(rr->rectf, rr->rectf,
00246                                     4, IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB, IB_PROFILE_SRGB, predivide,
00247                                     oglrender->sizex, oglrender->sizey, oglrender->sizex, oglrender->sizex);
00248     }
00249 
00250     RE_ReleaseResult(oglrender->re);
00251 
00252     /* update byte from float buffer */
00253     ibuf = BKE_image_acquire_ibuf(oglrender->ima, &oglrender->iuser, &lock);
00254 
00255     if (ibuf) {
00256         image_buffer_rect_update(scene, rr, ibuf, NULL);
00257 
00258         if (oglrender->write_still) {
00259             char name[FILE_MAX];
00260             int ok;
00261 
00262             if (scene->r.im_format.planes == R_IMF_CHAN_DEPTH_8) {
00263                 IMB_color_to_bw(ibuf);
00264             }
00265 
00266             BKE_makepicstring(name, scene->r.pic, oglrender->bmain->name, scene->r.cfra, scene->r.im_format.imtype, scene->r.scemode & R_EXTENSION, FALSE);
00267             ok = BKE_write_ibuf_as(ibuf, name, &scene->r.im_format, TRUE); /* no need to stamp here */
00268             if (ok) printf("OpenGL Render written to '%s'\n", name);
00269             else printf("OpenGL Render failed to write '%s'\n", name);
00270         }
00271     }
00272     
00273     BKE_image_release_ibuf(oglrender->ima, lock);
00274 }
00275 
00276 static int screen_opengl_render_init(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00277 {
00278     /* new render clears all callbacks */
00279     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00280     ScrArea *prevsa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00281     ARegion *prevar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00282     RenderResult *rr;
00283     GPUOffScreen *ofs;
00284     OGLRender *oglrender;
00285     int sizex, sizey;
00286     short is_view_context = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "view_context");
00287     const short is_animation = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "animation");
00288     const short is_sequencer = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "sequencer");
00289     const short is_write_still = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "write_still");
00290     char err_out[256] = "unknown";
00291 
00292     if (G.background) {
00293         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't use OpenGL render in background mode (no opengl context)");
00294         return 0;
00295     }
00296 
00297     /* ensure we have a 3d view */
00298 
00299     if (!ED_view3d_context_activate(C)) {
00300         RNA_boolean_set(op->ptr, "view_context", FALSE);
00301         is_view_context = 0;
00302     }
00303 
00304     /* only one render job at a time */
00305     if (WM_jobs_test(CTX_wm_manager(C), scene))
00306         return 0;
00307     
00308     if (!is_view_context && scene->camera == NULL) {
00309         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Scene has no camera");
00310         return 0;
00311     }
00312 
00313     if (!is_animation && is_write_still && BKE_imtype_is_movie(scene->r.im_format.imtype)) {
00314         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't write a single file with an animation format selected");
00315         return 0;
00316     }
00317 
00318     /* stop all running jobs, currently previews frustrate Render */
00319     WM_jobs_stop_all(CTX_wm_manager(C));
00320 
00321     /* create offscreen buffer */
00322     sizex = (scene->r.size * scene->r.xsch) / 100;
00323     sizey = (scene->r.size * scene->r.ysch) / 100;
00324 
00325     /* corrects render size with actual size, not every card supports non-power-of-two dimensions */
00326     ofs = GPU_offscreen_create(sizex, sizey, err_out);
00327 
00328     if (!ofs) {
00329         BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Failed to create OpenGL offscreen buffer, %s", err_out);
00330         return 0;
00331     }
00332 
00333     /* handle UI stuff */
00334     WM_cursor_wait(1);
00335 
00336     /* allocate opengl render */
00337     oglrender = MEM_callocN(sizeof(OGLRender), "OGLRender");
00338     op->customdata = oglrender;
00339 
00340     oglrender->ofs = ofs;
00341     oglrender->sizex = sizex;
00342     oglrender->sizey = sizey;
00343     oglrender->bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00344     oglrender->scene = scene;
00345     oglrender->cfrao = scene->r.cfra;
00346 
00347     oglrender->write_still = is_write_still && !is_animation;
00348 
00349     oglrender->is_sequencer = is_sequencer;
00350     if (is_sequencer) {
00351         oglrender->sseq = CTX_wm_space_seq(C);;
00352     }
00353 
00354 
00355     oglrender->obcenter_dia_back = U.obcenter_dia;
00356     U.obcenter_dia = 0;
00357 
00358     oglrender->prevsa = prevsa;
00359     oglrender->prevar = prevar;
00360 
00361     if (is_view_context) {
00362         ED_view3d_context_user_region(C, &oglrender->v3d, &oglrender->ar); /* so quad view renders camera */
00363         oglrender->rv3d = oglrender->ar->regiondata;
00364 
00365         /* MUST be cleared on exit */
00366         oglrender->scene->customdata_mask_modal = (ED_view3d_datamask(oglrender->scene, oglrender->v3d) |
00367                                                    ED_view3d_object_datamask(oglrender->scene) );
00368 
00369         /* apply immediately in case we're rendering from a script,
00370          * running notifiers again will overwrite */
00371         oglrender->scene->customdata_mask |= oglrender->scene->customdata_mask_modal;
00372 
00373     }
00374 
00375     /* create render */
00376     oglrender->re = RE_NewRender(scene->id.name);
00377 
00378     /* create image and image user */
00379     oglrender->ima = BKE_image_verify_viewer(IMA_TYPE_R_RESULT, "Render Result");
00380     BKE_image_signal(oglrender->ima, NULL, IMA_SIGNAL_FREE);
00381     BKE_image_backup_render(oglrender->scene, oglrender->ima);
00382 
00383     oglrender->iuser.scene = scene;
00384     oglrender->iuser.ok = 1;
00385 
00386     /* create render result */
00387     RE_InitState(oglrender->re, NULL, &scene->r, NULL, sizex, sizey, NULL);
00388 
00389     rr = RE_AcquireResultWrite(oglrender->re);
00390     if (rr->rectf == NULL)
00391         rr->rectf = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * 4 * sizex * sizey, "screen_opengl_render_init rect");
00392     RE_ReleaseResult(oglrender->re);
00393 
00394     return 1;
00395 }
00396 
00397 static void screen_opengl_render_end(bContext *C, OGLRender *oglrender)
00398 {
00399     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00400     Scene *scene = oglrender->scene;
00401 
00402     if (oglrender->mh) {
00403         if (BKE_imtype_is_movie(scene->r.im_format.imtype))
00404             oglrender->mh->end_movie();
00405     }
00406 
00407     if (oglrender->timer) { /* exec will not have a timer */
00408         scene->r.cfra = oglrender->cfrao;
00409         scene_update_for_newframe(bmain, scene, screen_opengl_layers(oglrender));
00410 
00411         WM_event_remove_timer(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_wm_window(C), oglrender->timer);
00412     }
00413 
00414     WM_cursor_wait(0);
00415     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_RENDER_RESULT, oglrender->scene);
00416 
00417     U.obcenter_dia = oglrender->obcenter_dia_back;
00418 
00419     GPU_offscreen_free(oglrender->ofs);
00420 
00421     oglrender->scene->customdata_mask_modal = 0;
00422 
00423     CTX_wm_area_set(C, oglrender->prevsa);
00424     CTX_wm_region_set(C, oglrender->prevar);
00425 
00426     MEM_freeN(oglrender);
00427 }
00428 
00429 static int screen_opengl_render_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00430 {
00431     screen_opengl_render_end(C, op->customdata);
00432 
00433     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00434 }
00435 
00436 /* share between invoke and exec */
00437 static int screen_opengl_render_anim_initialize(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00438 {
00439     /* initialize animation */
00440     OGLRender *oglrender;
00441     Scene *scene;
00442 
00443     oglrender = op->customdata;
00444     scene = oglrender->scene;
00445 
00446     oglrender->reports = op->reports;
00447     oglrender->mh = BKE_get_movie_handle(scene->r.im_format.imtype);
00448     if (BKE_imtype_is_movie(scene->r.im_format.imtype)) {
00449         if (!oglrender->mh->start_movie(scene, &scene->r, oglrender->sizex, oglrender->sizey, oglrender->reports)) {
00450             screen_opengl_render_end(C, oglrender);
00451             return 0;
00452         }
00453     }
00454 
00455     oglrender->cfrao = scene->r.cfra;
00456     oglrender->nfra = PSFRA;
00457     scene->r.cfra = PSFRA;
00458 
00459     return 1;
00460 }
00461 static int screen_opengl_render_anim_step(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00462 {
00463     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00464     OGLRender *oglrender = op->customdata;
00465     Scene *scene = oglrender->scene;
00466     ImBuf *ibuf;
00467     void *lock;
00468     char name[FILE_MAX];
00469     int ok = 0;
00470     const short view_context = (oglrender->v3d != NULL);
00471     Object *camera = NULL;
00472 
00473     /* update animated image textures for gpu, etc,
00474      * call before scene_update_for_newframe so modifiers with textures don't lag 1 frame */
00475     ED_image_update_frame(bmain, scene->r.cfra);
00476 
00477     /* go to next frame */
00478     while (CFRA < oglrender->nfra) {
00479         unsigned int lay = screen_opengl_layers(oglrender);
00480 
00481         if (lay & 0xFF000000)
00482             lay &= 0xFF000000;
00483 
00484         scene_update_for_newframe(bmain, scene, lay);
00485         CFRA++;
00486     }
00487 
00488     scene_update_for_newframe(bmain, scene, screen_opengl_layers(oglrender));
00489 
00490     if (view_context) {
00491         if (oglrender->rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB && oglrender->v3d->camera && oglrender->v3d->scenelock) {
00492             /* since scene_update_for_newframe() is used rather
00493              * then ED_update_for_newframe() the camera needs to be set */
00494             if (scene_camera_switch_update(scene)) {
00495                 oglrender->v3d->camera = scene->camera;
00496             }
00497 
00498             camera = oglrender->v3d->camera;
00499         }
00500     }
00501     else {
00502         scene_camera_switch_update(scene);
00503 
00504         camera = scene->camera;
00505     }
00506 
00507     /* render into offscreen buffer */
00508     screen_opengl_render_apply(oglrender);
00509 
00510     /* save to disk */
00511     ibuf = BKE_image_acquire_ibuf(oglrender->ima, &oglrender->iuser, &lock);
00512 
00513     if (ibuf) {
00514         /* color -> greyscale */
00515         /* editing directly would alter the render view */
00516         if (scene->r.im_format.planes == R_IMF_PLANES_BW) {
00517             ImBuf *ibuf_bw = IMB_dupImBuf(ibuf);
00518             IMB_color_to_bw(ibuf_bw);
00519             // IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf); /* owned by the image */
00520             ibuf = ibuf_bw;
00521         }
00522         else {
00523             /* this is lightweight & doesnt re-alloc the buffers, only do this
00524              * to save the correct bit depth since the image is always RGBA */
00525             ImBuf *ibuf_cpy = IMB_allocImBuf(ibuf->x, ibuf->y, scene->r.im_format.planes, 0);
00526             ibuf_cpy->rect = ibuf->rect;
00527             ibuf_cpy->rect_float = ibuf->rect_float;
00528             ibuf_cpy->zbuf_float = ibuf->zbuf_float;
00529             ibuf = ibuf_cpy;
00530         }
00531 
00532         if (BKE_imtype_is_movie(scene->r.im_format.imtype)) {
00533             ok = oglrender->mh->append_movie(&scene->r, SFRA, CFRA, (int *)ibuf->rect,
00534                                              oglrender->sizex, oglrender->sizey, oglrender->reports);
00535             if (ok) {
00536                 printf("Append frame %d", scene->r.cfra);
00537                 BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_INFO, "Appended frame: %d", scene->r.cfra);
00538             }
00539         }
00540         else {
00541             BKE_makepicstring(name, scene->r.pic, oglrender->bmain->name, scene->r.cfra, scene->r.im_format.imtype, scene->r.scemode & R_EXTENSION, TRUE);
00542             ok = BKE_write_ibuf_stamp(scene, camera, ibuf, name, &scene->r.im_format);
00543 
00544             if (ok == 0) {
00545                 printf("Write error: cannot save %s\n", name);
00546                 BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Write error: cannot save %s", name);
00547             }
00548             else {
00549                 printf("Saved: %s", name);
00550                 BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_INFO, "Saved file: %s", name);
00551             }
00552         }
00553 
00554         /* imbuf knows which rects are not part of ibuf */
00555         IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
00556     }
00557 
00558     BKE_image_release_ibuf(oglrender->ima, lock);
00559 
00560     /* movie stats prints have no line break */
00561     printf("\n");
00562 
00563     /* go to next frame */
00564     oglrender->nfra += scene->r.frame_step;
00565     scene->r.cfra++;
00566 
00567     /* stop at the end or on error */
00568     if (scene->r.cfra > PEFRA || !ok) {
00569         screen_opengl_render_end(C, op->customdata);
00570         return 0;
00571     }
00572 
00573     return 1;
00574 }
00575 
00576 
00577 static int screen_opengl_render_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00578 {
00579     OGLRender *oglrender = op->customdata;
00580     int anim = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "animation");
00581     int ret;
00582 
00583     switch (event->type) {
00584         case ESCKEY:
00585             /* cancel */
00586             screen_opengl_render_end(C, op->customdata);
00587             return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00588         case TIMER:
00589             /* render frame? */
00590             if (oglrender->timer == event->customdata)
00591                 break;
00592         default:
00593             /* nothing to do */
00594             return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00595     }
00596 
00597     /* run first because screen_opengl_render_anim_step can free oglrender */
00598     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_RENDER_RESULT, oglrender->scene);
00599     
00600     if (anim == 0) {
00601         screen_opengl_render_apply(op->customdata);
00602         screen_opengl_render_end(C, op->customdata);
00603         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00604     }
00605     else
00606         ret = screen_opengl_render_anim_step(C, op);
00607 
00608     /* stop at the end or on error */
00609     if (ret == 0) {
00610         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00611     }
00612 
00613     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00614 }
00615 
00616 static int screen_opengl_render_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00617 {
00618     OGLRender *oglrender;
00619     int anim = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "animation");
00620 
00621     if (!screen_opengl_render_init(C, op))
00622         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00623 
00624     if (anim) {
00625         if (!screen_opengl_render_anim_initialize(C, op))
00626             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00627     }
00628     
00629     oglrender = op->customdata;
00630     render_view_open(C, event->x, event->y);
00631     
00632     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
00633     oglrender->timer = WM_event_add_timer(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_wm_window(C), TIMER, 0.01f);
00634     
00635     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00636 }
00637 
00638 /* executes blocking render */
00639 static int screen_opengl_render_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00640 {
00641     const short is_animation = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "animation");
00642 
00643     if (!screen_opengl_render_init(C, op))
00644         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00645 
00646     if (!is_animation) { /* same as invoke */
00647         /* render image */
00648         screen_opengl_render_apply(op->customdata);
00649         screen_opengl_render_end(C, op->customdata);
00650 
00651         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00652     }
00653     else {
00654         int ret = 1;
00655 
00656         if (!screen_opengl_render_anim_initialize(C, op))
00657             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00658 
00659         while (ret) {
00660             ret = screen_opengl_render_anim_step(C, op);
00661         }
00662     }
00663 
00664     // no redraw needed, we leave state as we entered it
00665 //  ED_update_for_newframe(C, 1);
00666     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_RENDER_RESULT, CTX_data_scene(C));
00667 
00668     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00669 }
00670 
00671 void RENDER_OT_opengl(wmOperatorType *ot)
00672 {
00673     PropertyRNA *prop;
00674 
00675     /* identifiers */
00676     ot->name = "OpenGL Render";
00677     ot->description = "OpenGL render active viewport";
00678     ot->idname = "RENDER_OT_opengl";
00679 
00680     /* api callbacks */
00681     ot->invoke = screen_opengl_render_invoke;
00682     ot->exec = screen_opengl_render_exec; /* blocking */
00683     ot->modal = screen_opengl_render_modal;
00684     ot->cancel = screen_opengl_render_cancel;
00685 
00686     ot->poll = ED_operator_screenactive;
00687 
00688     prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "animation", 0, "Animation", "Render files from the animation range of this scene");
00689     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00690     prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "sequencer", 0, "Sequencer", "Render using the sequencer's OpenGL display");
00691     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00692     prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "write_still", 0, "Write Image", "Save rendered the image to the output path (used only when animation is disabled)");
00693     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00694     prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "view_context", 1, "View Context", "Use the current 3D view for rendering, else use scene settings");
00695     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00696 
00697 }
